attributes.title: App
attributes.review: This thing glitches way to much and I also don’t want to receive phone calls or anything from anyone soo.

attributes.title: Delete ✨❤️
attributes.review: This app has so many problems with it, from the endless amount of bugs and glitches to as why we have a app about orange face🟠I meant Trump.

attributes.title: bad app
attributes.review: When I downloaded it, it was NOT working. Everything about it was absolutely terrible. I support Trump, but this is NOT acceptable! 😡 If I had to rate it again, I’d rate it less than 1.

attributes.title: Biggest mistake 😡
attributes.review: As soon as I download the app my phone just shut down and then it sent my private pictures and videos to all the people in my contacts. 😡 DON’T DOWNLOAD THIS APP!!!!

attributes.title: Aha
attributes.review: I was kind of confused by the fact that anyone voted for him in the first place but I mean AHA. On the flip this has been the craziest and worst year of my life...am I blaming the president...yes! Would I normally Congress....yes! Is trump that bad that I actually blame the president....yes! But i mean AHA

attributes.title: Do not download this app (it is bad for you)
attributes.review:
Why you should not download this app always tells lies and nothing but lies. When I first open the app and started to sign in I notice my hair turning yellow and my skin turning orange. 
DONT DOWNLOAD THE APP NOT GOOD FOR YOU

attributes.title: It’s such a shame
attributes.review:
The app is really laggy and glitches a lot. Also, has a lot of bugs and viruses.0/10 would not recommend.#Trump2020onhisgravestone
🧚🏾‍♀️🙅🏾‍♀️👑👠💍

attributes.title: Trumps a fascist
attributes.review: I downloaded this app and my phone exploded🤭😔 still not sure how i ducktaped it back together to write this review but DO NOT DOWNLOAD. We spend too much money on our phones to have Cheeto mans app explode them

attributes.title: Bad
attributes.review: Asked for my phone number and I have been getting calls all day and night from spam numbers

attributes.title: Glitching
attributes.review: this app wouldn’t load. it downloaded and then kept glitching out. i didn’t even actually get to go on the app because it kept glitching.
